Name: Knife
If in Off-Hand: Forces Basic Miss Range to 1-3; Scales when Thrown

Name: Crossbow [Requires Arrows]
If in Off-Hand: Shoot on Basic Attack / Seperate Reload

Name: Pistol [Requires Pellets]
If in Off-Hand: Shoot on Basic Attack / Seperate Reload

Name: Rifle [Requirres Pellets]
If in Off-Hand: Shoot on Basic Attack / Seperate Reload

Name: Orb
If in Off-Hand: Empower Main Hand with 50% of its Base Damage
